description: Extend the Wool validation pattern (Validate() method returning ValidationError) to Yarn types: Message, Conversation, Session, Measurement. This ensures data integrity before storage or transmission.

phases.name: Foundation - ValidationError for Yarn
phases.description: Create a Yarn-specific ValidationError type following the Wool pattern, enabling consistent error handling across the package.

subtasks.title: Create validation.go with ValidationError type
subtasks.description: Create Yarn/validation.go with ValidationError struct containing Field and Message strings, plus Error() method. This mirrors Wool/agent.go's ValidationError but keeps packages independent.
acceptance_criteria: ValidationError struct with Field and Message fields
subtasks.notes: Created Yarn/validation.go with ValidationError struct containing Field and Message strings, plus Error() method returning "field: message" format. Follows Wool/agent.go pattern exactly.

phases.name: Message Validation
phases.description: Add Validate() method to Message type with comprehensive field validation.

subtasks.title: Implement Message.Validate() method
subtasks.description: Add Validate() method to Message struct that validates: ID is not empty, Role is valid (system/user/assistant/tool), Content is not empty for non-tool messages, Timestamp is not zero, ToolCallID and ToolName are consistent (both present for tool role). Add MessageRole.IsValid() helper method.
acceptance_criteria: Message.Validate() returns *ValidationError on failure, nil on success
Validates Role is one of: system, user, assistant, tool
Validates Content is required (unless tool role with tool fields)
Validates tool message consistency (role=tool requires ToolCallID)
subtasks.notes: Implemented MessageRole.IsValid() and Message.Validate() methods following Wool pattern. Validates: ID required, Role valid, Timestamp not zero, Content required for non-tool messages, ToolCallID required for tool messages.

subtasks.title: Implement HiddenState.Validate() method
subtasks.description: Add Validate() method to HiddenState struct that validates: Vector is not empty, Shape is consistent with Vector length, Layer is non-negative, DType is valid (float32/float16).
acceptance_criteria: HiddenState.Validate() returns *ValidationError on failure, nil on success
Validates DType is valid if specified
subtasks.notes: Implemented HiddenState.Validate() method that validates: Vector is not empty, Layer >= 0, Shape dimensions are positive and product matches Vector length, DType is float32/float16 if specified. Added ValidDTypes slice for allowed dtype values. Follows existing Yarn validation pattern.

subtasks.title: Add Message validation tests
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive tests for Message.Validate() covering valid messages, missing ID, invalid role, empty content, zero timestamp, tool message consistency, and HiddenState validation.
acceptance_criteria: Tests for valid message passes validation
Tests for each validation rule failure
subtasks.notes: Created Yarn/message_test.go with comprehensive tests for: MessageRole.IsValid(), Message.Validate(), HiddenState.Validate(), and ValidationError.Error(). Tests cover all validation rules including valid messages, missing ID, invalid role, empty content, zero timestamp, tool message consistency, hidden state validation (empty vector, negative layer, shape consistency, dtype validation), and factory function validation (NewMessage, NewAgentMessage). Total 528 lines of test code following Go table-driven test patterns.

phases.name: Conversation Validation
phases.description: Add Validate() method to Conversation type with validation of structure and contained messages.

subtasks.title: Implement Conversation.Validate() method
subtasks.description: Add Validate() method to Conversation struct that validates: ID is not empty, Name is not empty, CreatedAt is not zero, UpdatedAt is not before CreatedAt, all Messages are valid (cascade validation).
acceptance_criteria: Conversation.Validate() returns *ValidationError on failure, nil on success
subtasks.notes: Implemented Conversation.Validate() method that validates: ID is required, Name is required, CreatedAt is not zero, UpdatedAt is not before CreatedAt, and cascade validation for all Messages. Added strconv import for integer to string conversion. Follows established Yarn validation pattern from Message.Validate().

subtasks.title: Implement Participant.Validate() method
subtasks.description: Add Validate() method to Participant struct that validates: AgentID is not empty, Role is not empty, JoinedAt is not zero.
acceptance_criteria: Participant.Validate() returns *ValidationError on failure, nil on success

subtasks.title: Add Conversation validation tests
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive tests for Conversation.Validate() covering valid conversations, missing fields, time consistency, invalid messages, and participant validation.
acceptance_criteria: Tests for valid conversation passes validation
Tests for each validation rule failure

phases.name: Session Validation
phases.description: Add Validate() method to Session type with validation of configuration and contained data.

subtasks.title: Implement Session.Validate() method
subtasks.description: Add Validate() method to Session struct that validates: ID is not empty, Name is not empty, StartedAt is not zero, EndedAt (if set) is after StartedAt, Config.MeasurementMode is valid, all Conversations are valid, all Measurements are valid.
acceptance_criteria: Session.Validate() returns *ValidationError on failure, nil on success

subtasks.title: Implement SessionConfig.Validate() and MeasurementMode.IsValid()
subtasks.description: Add Validate() method to SessionConfig and IsValid() helper to MeasurementMode. SessionConfig validates MeasurementMode is valid. MeasurementMode.IsValid() returns true for passive/active/triggered.
acceptance_criteria: MeasurementMode.IsValid() returns true for valid modes
Empty MeasurementMode is handled (default or error)

subtasks.title: Add Session validation tests
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive tests for Session.Validate() covering valid sessions, missing fields, time consistency, invalid config, cascade validation for conversations and measurements.
acceptance_criteria: Tests for valid session passes validation
Tests for each validation rule failure
Tests for time consistency (EndedAt after StartedAt)

phases.name: Measurement Validation
phases.description: Add Validate() method to Measurement type with validation of metrics and participant data.

subtasks.title: Implement Measurement.Validate() method
subtasks.description: Add Validate() method to Measurement struct that validates: ID is not empty, Timestamp is not zero, TurnNumber >= 0, at least one of SenderID or ReceiverID is set, DEff >= 0, Beta >= 0 if set, Alignment in [-1, 1] range, BetaStatus is valid, hidden states (if present) are valid.
acceptance_criteria: Measurement.Validate() returns *ValidationError on failure, nil on success

subtasks.title: Implement BetaStatus.IsValid() method
subtasks.description: Add IsValid() method to BetaStatus that returns true for valid status values: optimal, monitor, concerning, critical, unknown.
acceptance_criteria: BetaStatus.IsValid() returns true for all defined constants
Returns false for empty or invalid values

subtasks.title: Add Measurement validation tests
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive tests for Measurement.Validate() covering valid measurements, missing fields, invalid metrics, BetaStatus validation, and hidden state cascade validation.
acceptance_criteria: Tests for valid measurement passes validation
Tests for each validation rule failure

phases.name: Integration and Documentation
phases.description: Ensure all validation works together and document the validation pattern.

subtasks.title: Add integration tests for cascade validation
subtasks.description: Create integration tests that verify full cascade validation works: Session -> Conversations -> Messages, Session -> Measurements. Test that invalid nested objects cause parent validation to fail with appropriate error context.
acceptance_criteria: Integration test for Session with invalid Conversation
Integration test for Session with invalid Measurement
Integration test for Conversation with invalid Message
Error messages indicate nested validation failures

subtasks.title: Run full test suite and verify coverage
subtasks.description: Run go test ./Yarn/... to verify all tests pass. Check test coverage is reasonable (>80% for validation code).

final_acceptance: All Yarn types (Message, Conversation, Session, Measurement) have Validate() methods
ValidationError type exists in Yarn package
Helper IsValid() methods exist for enums (MessageRole, MeasurementMode, BetaStatus)
All tests pass with go test ./Yarn/...
